title: Restaurant Conversations
description: Practice ordering food and having conversations at restaurants.

sentences.text: I'd like to make a reservation for two.
sentences.tips: 'I'd like to'를 부드럽게 연결하고, 'two'를 명확하게 발음하세요.

sentences.text: Can I see the menu, please?
I'll have the grilled chicken, please.
sentences.tips: 'I'll have'는 주문할 때 쓰는 표현입니다. 자신감 있게 말하세요.

sentences.text: How long will the food take?
sentences.tips: 'How long'에 강세를 주고 의문문 억양으로 끝내세요.

sentences.text: Could we have some more water?
Can I have the bill, please?
I'd like this to go, please.
sentences.tips: 'to go'는 포장 요청 표현입니다. 자연스럽게 연결하세요.

items: Did you pronounce food terms correctly?
Did you stress key words (allergic, recommend)?
Did you speak smoothly without long pauses?
Did you use polite expressions (I'd like, Could you)?
Would a waiter understand your order?
Did you express your needs clearly?
